title: 7 indications of dreaming of blue banknotes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, learn about them in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about blue banknotes Currency and money have become one of the essentials in our lives. Without them, we cannot buy anything from our needs, they are the usual way to get food, drink, clothes, etc., and when we see special blue bills in a dream, the dreamer wants to know its interpretation and whether it will bring him good and humanity or evil and seeks from it and prays to God to make him adapt to his evil, and in this article they will provide as many cases and interpretations as possible that concern him. Great scholars and interpreters in the world of dreams, such as the great scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about blue banknotes Blue paper money in a dream is one of the visions that carry many associations and signs that can be recognized through the following cases: Blue paper money in a dream indicates success, distinction, and achieving the goals and ambitions that the dreamer seeks. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is receiving blue banknotes, this symbolizes his promotion at work and achieving great financial gains. Blue paper money in a dream indicates the good luck that the dreamer will have in his life and his success in all his affairs. Interpretation of a dream about blue banknotes by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin referred to seeing paper money in a dream, and the following are some of the interpretations mentioned about it: The dreamer who sees a blue banknote in his dream, indicates happiness and many good things that he will get in his life. If the dreamer sees blue paper money in a dream, this symbolizes the luxurious life that he will live with his family members. Banknotes in a dream indicate great positive changes that will occur in the dreamer's life and change it for the better. Interpretation of a dream about blue banknotes for single women The interpretation of the paper star in a dream varies according to the dreamer's social status, The following is the interpretation of the unmarried girl who sees this symbol: The unmarried girl who sees blue banknotes in her dream indicates that she will marry a very wealthy man and live a luxurious life with him. Blue paper money in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates the cleanliness of her bed, her good reputation, and her good morals that make her popular with people. Interpretation of the dream of blue banknotes for a married woman A married woman who sees a blue banknote in a dream indicates the stability of her marital life, her intense love for her husband, and the spread of an atmosphere of love and familiarity in her family environment. If a married woman sees blue paper notes in a dream, this symbolizes the recovery of her financial situation and livelihood. Paper money in a married woman's dream is a sign that God will grant her righteous offspring. Interpretation of a dream about someone giving me a blue note for married people If a married woman sees in a dream that someone is giving her a blue note, this symbolizes the good qualities she possesses that make her stand high among people. A married woman who sees in her dream that she is receiving blue paper notes indicates a change

title: Interpretation of a dream about a heart: seeing a human heart in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a heart. Heart surgery in a dream. Heart palpitations in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a sick heart. A sheep’s heart in a dream. I dreamed that my heart stopped. Interpretation of a dream about a red heart. Heart shape in a dream. The heart said, and a man said: I saw that I was washing people’s hearts, so I said: It benefits their hearts and improves them with what you do. Another said: I saw that I was seeing people's hearts, so I said: You know secrets. As for the liver, a woman said: I saw that I was putting my head in my vagina, and I took a piece of my liver with my mouth and cut it into three pieces. I said: You have a son in Damascus. He told me: Yes, because the liver is a child. And all around him was blood. Cutting the vulva, which indicates that the boy is in a country called blood and splitting. I said: I knew that he was sick, and he said to me: Yes, because the liver was born and was reduced by taking it from it. And if there was a deficiency in the liver due to a disease, then I said: Something has come to you and you are strong for it - and he was in Egypt at that time - and he said to me: Yes. I said: Three hundred and three pieces. Then because the pieces were not the same, I said: I got a red and white dress, because when you cut the liver while it was still wet, its redness remained on the whiteness of the teeth. The red and white dress almost looks like, I said: Maybe your son is at the door of the tower. He told me: This is true. Another said: I saw that I ate liver, so I said: I sold a kitchen or oven and the like. Another said: I saw that I was cooking people's stomachs, so I said: You are hurting people's stomachs with your words, just as the spleen goes out to the liver. Someone said to me: I saw that I was selling clothes and I said: You are selling fans. Another said: I saw that I carried my spleen and it weighed on me. Heart disease - YouTube

title: Interpretation of the dream of the hijab in a dream and the meanings of the hijab in the dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about the hijab in a dream through our website in a dream. Learn about the most important opinions of the translators mentioned in the interpretation books about seeing the hijab in a dream for single and married women. A silencer in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a silencer. The hijab appears in a dream many things. It can show a woman’s adornment. The veil can show marriage and good circumstances. The interpretation of the veil in a dream is also interpreted according to the color of the veil and the condition of the veil in the dream, and it is also interpreted according to the condition of the dreamer. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of the veil indicates purity, concealment, and adornment, and it was said that it indicates protection from evil. The interpretation of the dream indicates Wearing the hijab in dreams means keeping away from problems and it is said that it indicates religiosity and worship. Seeing a torn hijab in a dream indicates the dreamer’s lack of worship or lack of religion and perhaps a decrease in his money. See also: Wearing the niqab in a dream Wearing the hijab in a dream Silencer in a dream It is said that seeing the hijab in The dream indicates a lot of money, and this is as much as the purity and whiteness of the hijab in the dream. The interpretation of the dream about the hijab according to the opinion of Imam Nabulsi is that it appears to the husband and wearing the hijab at parties is bad morals. The white hijab in the dream indicates knowledge and learning and indicates seeking benefit from a knowledgeable person. The interpretation of a dream about a pink veil shows passion and may indicate a relationship that does not last. The green veil in a dream indicates safety and security and is said to indicate psychological comfort and complete health. The veil in an unmarried woman’s dream. The interpretation of a dream about a veil for an unmarried woman indicates marriage to her and may indicate her good reputation. And morals among people. The interpretation of seeing a hijab in a dream for an unmarried woman may indicate her closeness to God Almighty, and torn it indicates a lack of worship. Losing the hijab in a dream for an unmarried woman means neglecting her health, and stealing it indicates people’s interference in her life. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a hijab in A dream for an unmarried woman or wrapping it is evidence of success in her work or study. The interpretation of seeing a black veil in a dream for an unmarried woman may indicate the conclusion of agreements and their emergence. Seeing a veil in a dream for a married woman Interpretation of a dream about a veil in a dream for a married woman indicates her fragrant life’s biography and the best of her circumstances, Cutting the hijab means not having a husband. Seeing the hijab in a dream for a married woman can indicate work and knowledge, and the white hijab in a dream means understanding religion. Seeing the hijab in a dream for a married woman and wearing the hijab may indicate her adherence to her religion, and buying the white hijab in a dream is a gift. Interpretation Buying a hijab in a dream for a married woman and its color is gray may indicate that the dreamer is spending his money on things that are not useful to her. Interpretation of a dream about taking off the hijab for a married woman is an indication of the eruption of disputes between her and her husband, as losing the hijab is not worthy of praise. Interpretation of a dream about hijab for a divorced woman. Interpretation of a dream about hijab for a divorced woman can It is a sign of marriage with her and can indicate purity, chastity and a good reputation. Interpretation of a dream about the hijab for a divorced woman and a gift

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing fear in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: He begins by searching for the meaning of the vision. It could be fear of an animal, a thief, a jinn, a quarrel, etc., and therefore the interpretation varies according to the details of the dream. Seeing fear in a dream by Ibn Sirin, and Sheikh Ibn Shirin confirmed this by seeing fear in a dream indicating the safety of the visible from any danger in reality. He said. It was for comfort and tranquility. What does a person feel after he realizes the correct way to achieve his ambitions? Perhaps the vision that he loves people, the fortuneteller, or his great love for pets. He said that fear in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer has sufficient ability to solve his crises in any way. Courage and intelligence. When someone dreams He feels that she is afraid of an unknown man. For him, it is a sign that the unknown person is the same as the dreamer and is always reviewing himself and blaming her for the mistakes she makes. Interpretation of a dream about fear in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees herself afraid in a dream is a sign of her feelings of self-confidence and self-esteem. Extreme fear in a dream An unmarried woman is a sign of her exceptional beauty, which makes her family fear those around her. Commentators also agreed that fear in a dream symbolizes freedom for a happy event such as academic success, engagement, or marriage status. The meaning of seeing the fear of a jinn in a dream When someone dreams that he saw a jinn or was a stranger and was afraid of him, this indicates the strength of the dreamer and the great energy he possesses. And wonderful, except for others. Whoever sees the jinn in a dream and is afraid of him and does not go, then the vision shows that the dreamer has the strength of faith and is steadfast in his faith. His doctrine and he maintains the duties and Sunnah and small actions. A dream of fear accompanying a trip in a dream. When this person sees that he is afraid of a strange person and leaving it indicates the dreamer’s will. This is unknown. It may indicate that he is participating in a new project. As for seeing a man fearing a woman in a dream, this is evidence of the strength of his love and his love for her. Escaping because of fear in a dream indicates that you will succeed after studying, fatigue and hard work. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital situation in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about selling something. The meaning of selling in a dream

preview.html: Selling a house in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about buying and selling in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about selling in a storeInterpretation of a dream about selling in a storeTrading in a dreamInterpretation of seeing buying in a dreamSelling food in a dreamSelling land in a dreamThe dream of selling: That whoever dreams of being sold, or of being invited, will be honored and gain honor and power if the woman buys it, and this Good evidence. As for the well-to-do and the sick, this is a sign of evil, and the interpretation of the sale differs depending on the sale. What was bad for the seller was good for the buyer, and what was good for the seller is bad for the buyer. It was said: Selling is the death of the property, and the seller is the buyer, and the buyer is the seller, and the sale is better than the sold. The dream is empty of what he sold and wants what he bought. Perhaps the impact of this world on the afterlife, or the nation on freedom, or disobedience on obedience. Perhaps the sale is evidence of the humiliation of a free man if the sale takes place in a dream, but its outcome will be good compared to the story of Joseph, peace be upon him. As for Ibn Sirin, he interpreted the dream of a dream about a sale: it differs in interpretation depending on the item sold, and whoever sees that it is a sale or a request, then the buyer, if A man wins it, and if a woman buys it, he is affected by power, glory, and honor, and the higher the price, the more generous he is, but we said that selling in a dream requires the price of the thing sold, because God Almighty. God says in the story of Joseph, peace be upon him: {And whoever buys it from Egypt and says to his wife, “Honor his dwelling.” Selling is excitement about the thing sold. Interpretation of selling in a dream - YouTube

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a divorced girl giving birth in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl for a divorced woman: Every woman begs and pleads with God to give birth to her and fulfill her dream of motherhood. Money and children are the adornments of this worldly life. When a divorced woman sees in her dream that she has given birth to a child, she feels mixed feelings between joy at fulfilling her desire and her desire to know the interpretation and whether the interpretation will return to her good or bad, so we will explain all of this as much as possible in this article by presenting several cases related to this symbol as well. As some of the opinions and sayings of the great scholars and interpreters such as the scholar Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about a girl giving birth to a divorced woman. Seeing a girl giving birth to a divorced woman in a dream has many effects and signs that can be identified through the following cases: A divorced woman who dreams that she gives birth to a girl is a sign On the great goodness and tremendous abundance that she will receive in her life. Giving birth to a baby girl in the dream of a woman separated from her husband indicates getting rid of her distress, removing her worries and sorrows, and enjoying a life free of troubles and worries. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream means that she is pregnant and giving birth to a child, and that her situation will change for the better. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a girl for a divorced woman, according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin dealt with the interpretation of the presence of a girl in a dream for a divorced woman, and the following are some of the interpretations that came from him: Giving birth to a girl from a divorced woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin is a vision that indicates the good of her condition and the strength of her faith, and before God is the best of her deeds. If a divorced woman dreams To give birth to a girl, this symbolizes success, success, and the satisfaction of her desires that will be fulfilled by God’s response to her prayers. Seeing a woman whose husband has divorced her giving birth to a girl in a dream indicates her high status and position and assuming an important position in her field of work. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl by Ibn Shaheen, one of the most important interpreters who discussed The birth of a girl in a dream according to Ibn Shaheen, so we present to him some of the aforementioned interpretations: Ibn Shaheen explains that seeing the birth of a girl in a dream indicates that the dreamer will reach his goal and achieve everything he wants and hopes for. The birth of a female in a dream is good news for the dreamer to hear happy news and the arrival of weddings and occasions. Happy for her. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl for a woman divorced from her ex-wife. A divorced woman who sees in her dream that she is giving birth to a girl from her ex-husband indicates the possibility of returning to him again and avoiding the mistakes of the past. If a divorced woman dreams that she is pregnant from her ex-husband and gives birth to a girl, this symbolizes the return of stability and comfort. To her life again after a period of suffering and exhaustion. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a beautiful girl for a divorced woman. The interpretation of a girl in a dream getting divorced varies according to her appearance, especially the beautiful face, as follows: A divorced woman who dreams that she gives birth to a beautiful girl in a dream indicates that she will get opportunities. A good job will bring her great success and earn her a lot of money. If a woman divorced from her husband sees that she is pregnant and gives birth to a girl with a beautiful face in a dream, this symbolizes her good reputation and good morals that she enjoys among people, which makes her a source of trust. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth

Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl by Ibn Shaheen, one of the most important interpreters who discussed The birth of a girl in a dream according to Ibn Shaheen, so we present to him some of the aforementioned interpretations: Ibn Shaheen explains that seeing the birth of a girl in a dream indicates that the dreamer will reach his goal and achieve everything he wants and hopes for. The birth of a female in a dream is good news for the dreamer to hear happy news and the arrival of weddings and occasions. Happy for her. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl for a woman divorced from her ex-wife. A divorced woman who sees in her dream that she is giving birth to a girl from her ex-husband indicates the possibility of returning to him again and avoiding the mistakes of the past. If a divorced woman dreams that she is pregnant from her ex-husband and gives birth to a girl, this symbolizes the return of stability and comfort. To her life again after a period of suffering and exhaustion. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a beautiful girl for a divorced woman. The interpretation of a girl in a dream getting divorced varies according to her appearance, especially the beautiful face, as follows: A divorced woman who dreams that she gives birth to a beautiful girl in a dream indicates that she will get opportunities. A good job will bring her great success and earn her a lot of money. If a woman divorced from her husband sees that she is pregnant and gives birth to a girl with a beautiful face in a dream, this symbolizes her good reputation and good morals that she enjoys among people, which makes her a source of trust. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth

title: Interpretation of seeing a ball in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a ball in a dream: Many of us love football and love watching and playing it. Interpretation of your vision or vision of playing with it, so the encyclopedia presents to you in today’s article the interpretation of seeing a ball in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a ball in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar of interpretation, Ibn Sirin, believes that seeing a ball in a dream is a sign of strife, because it is one of the games that depends on taking it. By force from others. Interpretation of seeing a ball in a dream by Al-Nabulsi: The famous interpreter Al-Nabulsi indicates that the ball is a sign of strife, just as a ball in a dream can be a symbol of the world. The ball can also be seen in a dream as evidence of movement and travel between countries, and this is because of its transmission from one person to another during Playing. In some cases, a ball in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s distance from the memory of God and a sign of his preoccupation with what distracts him from the worship of Almighty God and His approach. Interpretation of seeing a ball in a dream for a single, pregnant woman, married woman, and man: Interpretation of seeing a ball in a dream for a single woman: If she sees An unmarried girl in a romantic relationship sees herself playing with a ball in a dream, her dream indicates that she will fail in her or her relationship and it can also be an indication of problems that will go away. In her life, these problems will not be limited to her alone, but may extend to all members of her family. Seeing an unmarried woman hitting a ball with her head is a sign that she is suffering from worry and anxiety, God forbid. Interpretation of seeing a ball in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a ball in a dream warns a married woman that she may be exposed to many disagreements and problems between her and her husband, as the woman is in This case is concerned with achieving her goals and ambitions without caring about her husband or his interests. It causes many disputes between them. Interpretation of seeing a ball in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees that she is playing a ball in a dream, this is good news for her that she will enjoy good health and will soon give birth to her child. She will also enjoy security and health and will have a wonderful position, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a ball in a dream for a man: If a man sees in his dream that he is playing with a ball and then kicks it, this is a sign of the great responsibility that he will bear in his life. If the ball is hit from the head, this is an indication of worry and anxiety that will affect the viewer. Whoever finds in a dream that he He owns the ball during the match and controls it, he will earn money illegally. The other team getting the ball and the fortune teller being unable to get it from them is a sign of seizure or imprisonment. Interpretation of seeing a ball in a dream according to its color: A red ball in a dream indicates a beautiful woman and she could be Also a sign of the efforts through which the dreamer seeks to obtain this beautiful woman. The black ball indicates that the dreamer is exposed to deception, deception and many conspiracies both at work and in life in general. The white ball is a sign of the fortuneteller’s character of purity, chastity and good faith. The gray ball is a sign of the priest’s debts. If he catches it, he will pay his debt, God willing, but if he is unable to fulfill it, it will not be fulfilled.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a refrigerator?  What are the negative connotations of the vision?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a refrigerator: The refrigerator is one of the important things in every home and it plays a major role in preserving and freezing food. As for seeing a refrigerator in a dream, is it good or bad? We will explain this in the following lines, so that the dreamer’s heart can be reassured and know the correct clues around him. Read to find out what is new with us. Interpretation of a dream about a refrigerator: Seeing a refrigerator in a dream means the good news that a woman will learn at a late age and her life will change for the better, and taking milk out of the refrigerator in a dream for For a young man, it symbolizes his close marriage to a girl who is good, morals and religious. Seeing a refrigerator full of food in a dream means that the woman will know the news of her pregnancy in the coming days and the departure of dissenters and haters from her life, and she will enjoy peace and stability with her husband. The refrigerator in the dream indicates the great inheritance that he will receive in the next stage. Interpretation of a dream about a refrigerator by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a refrigerator in a dream symbolizes a person’s liberation from the adversities and difficulties that he faced on his way to his success in the previous period, and he will triumph over his enemies so that he can live safely and steadily far away. Deception, lying, and an empty refrigerator in a woman’s dream indicate her good relationship with her family, her husband, and her Lord’s acceptance of her repentance and remorse for the mistakes she made because of bad friends in the past. Seeing a refrigerator in Ibn Sirin’s dream about the girl indicates that her marriage contract is close to a young man with good morals and religion, and he will take her by the hand and bring her closer to her Lord and the straight path. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google. And get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a refrigerator for single people. Seeing a refrigerator in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes the positive changes that will occur in her life and obtaining a suitable job opportunity for this coming period can improve her financial income for the better and make her self-reliant, and replacing the refrigerator by the girl in the place in the dream It indicates that she will move to a new home to start a family with her life partner in the coming days. Seeing a refrigerator in a girl’s dream indicates that she has heard a group of good news that she will learn in the next life, and it may be her excellence in her studies, which will be of great importance in society. Interpretation of a dream Opening the refrigerator for single women. Seeing the refrigerator being opened in a dream for single women indicates the end of the ordeals and difficulties that she was exposed to because of her haters and envy and her progress in life. Seeing the refrigerator being opened in a dream for a girl symbolizes the good luck that she will enjoy. In the coming era, she will live in joy and happiness due to her reputation at work, her efficiency, and her acting skills in various situations. Interpretation of a dream about a refrigerator for a married woman. Seeing a refrigerator in a dream for a married woman symbolizes the wealth, goodness, and abundance that she will obtain in the coming period of her life. Opening the refrigerator in a dream indicates a decent life that She lives there with her husband and children and is able to raise them properly

title: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream in detail

preview.html: Seeing prayer in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes the satisfaction of her need and avoiding immorality, and the dream of praying in the mosque for an unmarried girl indicates her feeling of security and comfort, and if the unmarried girl sees herself praying towards the Qiblah in a dream, she follows religion and Sharia, and the dream of wearing single clothes indicates her purity and chastity in her life, God knows best. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained the vision of prayer in a dream for an unmarried woman to meet her need and satisfy her desires and is considered one of the promising visions in the disappearance of her worries and sorrows, and if the unmarried girl sees herself performing the obligatory prayer in a dream, this indicates her performance of her duties and commitment to religion. The prayer of the righteous man's church in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates work and effort to please God Almighty. Al-Nabulsi says: “Seeing prayer in a dream for an unmarried woman bodes well in her life.” And justice in her religion, and if an unmarried girl sees that she is praying in a dream, this indicates her confusion in a deadly matter, and whoever sees that she is praying in a dream, repents, and stays away from sins. Sins and the dream of supplication for unmarried women is evidence of salvation from distress and dangers. Fajr prayer in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates fulfilling promises and covenants, and if an unmarried girl sees that she is praying the noon prayer in a dream, this means that she will achieve what she wants and the afternoon prayer in a dream. Unmarried women indicate something that happens after hardships, but seeing the sunset prayer in a dream indicates its performance. The rights of her parents and the dream of the evening prayer for a single woman indicates marriage to a righteous person. The lack of prayer in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates difficult things and the interruption of work, and the dream of laughing in prayer for an unmarried woman indicates a lot of fun in her life, and God knows best. Interpretation of praying in the mosque in a dream for a single woman Ibn Sirin said: If a single person sees prayer in a dream, prayer in a dream: he enjoys security and reassurance. And the prayer of greeting the mosque in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the responsibility of supporting the family or a relative, and if an unmarried girl sees that she is praying in the mosque and leaves it in a dream, she receives kindness and guidance, and if an unmarried woman sees that she is prevented from praying in the mosque in a dream, this indicates the presence of someone who wants evil and harbors evil for her. Praying in the Grand Mosque in a dream indicates obtaining reward and reward, and the dream of praying in the Prophet’s Mosque for an unmarried woman indicates that she follows the Sunnah of the Prophet and her commitment to the Sharia, and seeing prayer in Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream. One indicates their victory over their enemies. The dream of an unmarried woman praying in congregation in the mosque indicates a close commitment, God willing. Seeing prayer in the mosque with women in a dream for an unmarried woman means intimate friendship and living with the righteous, and praying with her family in the mosque in a dream means meeting them on a matter in which there is goodness and blessing, and whoever sees that he is praying in the mosque with men in a dream, this
